pages.text: vekaleti-lyehudu leyseti-nnesara `ala sey'. vekaleti-nnesara leyseti-lyehudu `ala sey'iv vehum yetlune-lkitab. kezalike kale-llezine la ya`lemune misle kavlihim. fellahu yahkumu beynehum yevme-lkiyameti fima kanu fihi yahtelifun
vemen azlemu mimmem mene`a mesacide-llahi ey yuzkera fihe-smuhu vese`a fi harabiha. ulaike ma kane lehum ey yedhuluha illa haifin. lehum fi-ddunya hizyuv velehum fi-l'ahirati `azabun `azim
velillahi-lmesriku velmagribu feeynema tuvellu fesemme vechu-llah. inne-llahe vasi`un `alim
vekalu-ttehaze-llahu veleden subhaneh. bel lehu ma fi-ssemavati vel'ard. kullul lehu kanitun
bedi`u-ssemavati vel'ard. veiza kada emran feinnema yekulu lehu kun feyekun
vekale-llezine la ya`lemune levla yukellimune-llahu ev te'tina ayeh. kezalike kale-llezine min kablihim misle kavlihim. tesabehet kulubuhum. kad beyyenne-l'ayati likavmiy yukinun
inna erselnake bilhakki besirav venezirav vela tus'elu `an ashabi-lcehim
